page.title: 08Recreational Facilities.
page.content: There are many clubs on Canford Heath. The Beacon Centre is used by a range of people.The members of the Beacon Centre's youth club play sports like soccer,badminton,snooker,table-tennis and rounders. The Community Centre is a place where families meet and have drinks.There is a large hall where people can play badminton. At the Scout and Cub halls,still being built by parents.They meet once a week to play games and other activities. They also go on camping outings. The Haymoor Squash club was built a year ago.There is a squash league and so there is fierce competition.After having a game they have a drink in the bar.
